title: HTF Gotham / HI Chalet
content:
Hi.   
Im choosing typeface for recent work and found that the style of HTF Gotham / HI Chalet is the right way for me. Gotham Medium and Chalet New-York 1960 are in right weight and form with geometrical feel and look. Im tryin' to find variations of its style and need help of the board.   
   
As i read here ( [http://houseind.com/house.php?kit=CHALET-FO&sub=special](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015540/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=CHALET-FO&sub=special)) Neue Haas Grotesque have to be close to Chalet, but i cant find any Haas Grotesque from modern typefoundries or maybe it is fully replaced with Helvetica?   
   
Does Akzidenz-Grotesk a good choise in this story?   
Please help.   
   
Vladimir Losinsky
